title: API configuration schema
description: API configuration schema. For more info see http://json-schema.org/ and https://frontaid.io/blog/json-schema-vscode/

ginPort.title: The port for Gin / Gin框架端口

nuxtPort.title: The port for Nuxt / Nuxt框架devServer端口

baseUrl.title: The base url for nuxt. / Nuxt的BaseUrl

killPortBeforeDevelop.title: Kill port before develop / 开发前释放端口

cleanupBeforeDevelop.title: Cleanup before develop / 开发前清理
